column4: hey guys.  i'm a little stumped here.  i'm trying to download a video from a link in firefox, but when i click it it starts playing the video in the firefox page instead of asking me to download it.  it's not a link that i can just right click+download.
once it is open can you drag it to the download icon
it doesn't seem like i can drag the playing video.
try the address bar or tab
